hero.title: Guha Ububasha Abagore bo mu Rwanda
hero.description: Ifatanye na purogaramu yacu kugira ngo ubone ibikoresho, wihuze n'ibikorwa, kandi ubone amahirwe y'akazi yagenewe abagore bo mu Rwanda. Turi hano kugira ngo dushyigikire iterambere ryawe bwite n'umwuga.

objective.title: Intego Yacu
objective.description:
Intego yacu ni uguha abagore bo mu Rwanda ububasha tubaha ibikoresho ngombwa, amahirwe yo kwiga, n'umuryango ubafasha.

Intego yacu ni ukwagura, gufatanya, no gutsinda mu bagore bo mu mujyi wacu, dukora inzira zo kugira ubwigenge mu bukungu no kuyobora.

healthcare.name: Ubuzima
healthcare.description: Kubona ibikoresho n'ubufasha bw'ubuzima byagenewe abagore

education.name: Uburezi
education.description: Vumbura amahirwe yo kwiga no gahunda zo guteza imbere ubumenyi

finance.name: Imari
finance.description: Gushaka ibikoresho byo kwiga imari n'amahirwe yo kubona amafaranga

stories.name: Jane Doe
stories.content: Kubera Ikigo cy'Abagore mu Rwanda, nasanze akazi nkunda kandi n'abantu ban'umviye cyane, batuma ntera imbere buri munsi! Ibikoresho n'amahirwe yo gukorana byamfashije cyane mu guteza imbere umwuga wanjye.

stories.name: Mary Kwizera
stories.content: Ibikoresho biri hano byamfashije gutangira ubucuruzi bwanjye. Sinashoboraga kubikora nta bufasha bw'iyi porogaramu! Gahunda y'ubuyobozi yamfashije kugira abayobozi b'ubucuruzi bampubeje kandi banyobora mu bihe bikomeye.

callToAction.title: Iyungirane n'Umuryango Wacu
callToAction.description: Bona ibikoresho byihariye, ibikorwa byo guhuza, n'amahirwe y'akazi yagenewe abagore bo mu Rwanda.

resources.title: Ibikoresho by'Abagore
resources.noResources: Nta bikoresho byabonetse. Ba uwa mbere mu kongeraho kimwe!
resources.connectionError: Nta gisubizo kibonetse. Nyamuneka, reba umurongo wawe.
resources.mapInstructions: Kanda ku ikarita kugira ngo ushyireho ahantu, ukurure ikimenyetso kugira ngo uhindure, cyangwa ukoreshe buto y'ahantu kugira ngo ushyireho aho uri.
resources.mapsNotConfigured: Urufunguzo rwa Google Maps API ntirwateguwe
resources.geolocationNotSupported: Kumenya ahantu ntibisanzwe muri iki gikoresho
resources.saveError: Ntibyashobotse kubika igikoresho. Nyamuneka, gerageza nanone.
resources.noResponse: Nta gisubizo cyabonetse. Igikoresho gishobora kuba cyarasibwe.

community.description: Ihuze n'abandi bagore, gusangira uburambe, kubaza ibibazo, no kubona ubufasha.
community.guideline1: Kubahana no kwita ku bagize umuryango bose
community.guideline2: Kuguma ku biganiro byerekeranye n'inyungu n'ibikenewe n'abagore
community.guideline3: Gusangira uburambe bwite ariko ukubaha ubuzima bwite bw'abandi

discussions.title: Ibiganiro
discussions.deleteConfirm: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba iki kiganiro?
discussions.signInToComment: Nyamuneka injira kugira ngo witabire ikiganiro.
discussions.noComments: Nta bitekerezo kugeza ubu. Ba uwa mbere mu gutanga igitekerezo!

createDiscussion.title: Tangiza Ikiganiro Gishya
createDiscussion.contentPlaceholder: Sangiza ibitekerezo byawe, ibibazo, cyangwa uburambe...

healthAdvice.title: Inama ku Buzima
healthAdvice.description: Ganira ku bibazo bijyanye n'ubuzima no gusangira inama.

financialSupport.title: Ubufasha bw'Imari
financialSupport.description: Habwa kandi utange inama z'imari n'ubufasha.

technology.title: Ikoranabuhanga
technology.description: Sangiza inama za tekiniki, inama, n'amahirwe.

profile.title: Umwirondoro Wanjye
profile.noResponse: Nta gisubizo cyabonetse. Nyamuneka, gerageza nanone.
profile.deleteUnexpectedError: Gusiba igikoresho byanze kubera ikosa ritateganyijwe

footer.tagline: Guha ububasha abagore bo mu Rwanda binyuze mu bikoresho, umuryango, n'ubufasha.
